Question
========

A research article presents three experiments on the effect of cold on mood. These experiments are very similar and differ only in the way mood is measured. Of what kind of replication is involved here?

Answerlist
----------

* Conceptual replication
* Direct replication
* Systematic replication

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Conceptual replication: Incorrect
* Direct replication: Incorrect
* Systematic replication: Correct
